name: Bocce Beach
description: Step into the tropical paradise of Bocce Beach and play an immersive bocce ball game in VR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
